name: Mindfulness hikes
description: Berlin is a wonderful, big and really green city.  You will get to know it from a different point of view because we will take you to the heart of who you are using Berlin´s nature and neighbourhoods as an excuse for you to get deeply in touch with yourself, your nature as a human being and will give you different tools that you can take with you and use for the rest of your life.  This is a life changing experience.  Your whole philosophy of life can change after one of our trips.
